Instant reloading and 15% increased dama: Bottom half of the magazine does additional damage starting at a 1% increase to 75% for the final round. The increase follows an exponential curve
column3: so damage will be overstated for all but the final rounds.

Instant reloading and 15% increased dama: Increased damage for the final round in the magazine. Treated as if it were spread across the clip.
